introduction: SYNOPSISSeung-ah fails to get into college and wander through life. She meets Jin-tae and loses her virginity to him. She continues to be psychologically lost until she meets her true love Seok-ho, an ice hockey player. But he dies tragically during a game. Her wanderings in night markets lead her to meet psychiatrist named Min Jeong-gi. They develop a father/daughter relationship but she is soon disappointed by his hypocrisy. She returns to Jin-tae and begins to appreciate rough but genuine nature and begins a new life.故事承升离开大学，遇见金泰，失去了无辜。心理游荡的年轻人遇到了冰球运动员石浩，并学会了真正的爱情，但他不幸在比赛后死亡。将围绕城市在深绗缝seungah见面会上minjeonggi心理医生和教授感到bunyeogan的感情徘徊转向感觉他的虚伪感到失望。最后，她看到了一个粗糙的，但最内在的金溪内侧，生活得到了一个粗糙的新面貌。
